headline: Halliburton Appoints Shannon Slocum as Executive Vice President and Chief Operating Officer
summary: HOUSTON, December 04, 2025--Halliburton (NYSE: HAL) announced today that Shannon Slocum has been promoted to executive vice president and chief operating officer and appointed to the board of directors, effective Jan. 1, 2026.
